function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate governance of urban green spaces in Latin American cities","Impact":"Increase in public health risks due to lack of proper management and regulation of green spaces","Mitigation":"Enhance governance structures and policies to ensure proper management and regulation of urban green spaces","Technologies":"Urban planning and management software, surveillance technologies for monitoring compliance","People":"Citizens, city officials, public health authorities","Owner":"City governments, urban planning agencies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate protocol, staff, and equipment for managing limited access and monitoring compliance in green spaces","Impact":"Risk of overcrowding and lack of compliance, leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Develop and implement protocols for limited access, allocate sufficient staff, and provide necessary equipment for monitoring compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, crowd monitoring software","People":"Green space managers, city officials, public health authorities","Owner":"City governments, green space management authorities"}]}
